# South Carolina Republican Candidates for 2026

Support conservative candidates across South Carolina!

## State Senate Candidates

### Incumbents Seeking Re-Election

**Thomas Anderson** - Senate District 5 (incumbent)
A proven conservative leader serving since 2018.

**Barbara Mitchell** - Senate District 14 (incumbent)
Fighting for lower taxes and smaller government.

### Challengers and Open Seat Candidates

**William Roberts** - District 18 Senate (challenger)
William is a farmer and small business owner from Lexington.

**Patricia Taylor** - Senate District 31
Patricia is running for the open seat vacated by the retiring senator.

## State House Candidates

### Incumbents

**Richard Thompson** - House District 67 (incumbent)
Strong supporter of Second Amendment rights.

### New Candidates

**Christopher Lee** - HD 91
Chris is a manufacturing executive focused on job creation.

**Margaret White** - House District 104
Margaret is a retired teacher fighting for parental rights in education.

**Daniel Brown** - District 118 House
Daniel is a real estate developer running on economic issues.
